About Me

Greetings! I'm Octane, a skilled motion designer with more than three years of experience. My design services are diverse and cater to your every need, so kindly peruse them and don't hesitate to reach out for any inquiries or design requests.

DESIGNS

AIRBUS

This is a design I forged for AirbusDZN, a fellow motion designer. I am very proud of the overall visuals of this intro and I think it's a cool style.

SHOWCASE

This is one of my latest designs! I made this to further promote my channel and show off my skills. It's a basic styled intro but was a lot of work to perfect.

VOIDYXYL

This design was inspired originally from DreamFX, an awesome creator. I decided to use my knowledge and persevere and I did!

Love the vibe!

- AuroicAuri
